name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 4, Shangqiu, Henan. The owners of Greenland International Exhibition City Phase 5 gathered at the gate to defend their rights. That night, the property management guarded the gate and did not allow the owners' cars to enter or leave. The gate of the community was full of cars. It is understood that the project had illegally misappropriated the owners' maintenance fund and forced the owners to buy parking spaces even when the garage was sealed by the court. The garage was not cleaned and there was a water seepage problem. There were even multiple cases where the security guards deliberately used the gate to smash the owners' cars.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 4 (Release), Nanchang, Jiangxi. A family member posted a video saying that his son Gan Huitao had a craniotomy at the Second Affiliated Hospital of Nanchang University. The doctor privately processed the cut skull and sold it to a pharmaceutical company for use as transplant material. "Some pharmaceutical companies even steal corpses to get skulls."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The French political arena was shaken, and the extreme left and extreme right united to defect. On December 4, the French National Assembly voted on a motion of no confidence in Prime Minister Barnier's government. The result was 331 votes in favor, exceeding the absolute majority of the National Assembly required for the motion, which was 289 votes. Barnier's government was overthrown. Two hours later, Macron will deliver a national speech.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The French political arena was shaken, with the extreme left and extreme right joining forces to overthrow the government. On December 4, the French National Assembly voted on a motion of no confidence in Prime Minister Barnier's government, with 331 votes in favor, exceeding the absolute majority of the National Assembly required for the motion, which is 289 votes. Barnier's government was overthrown. Two hours later, Macron will deliver a national speech.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The latest news is that French President Macron will not announce the next prime minister in his televised speech tonight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In a televised speech, Macron said he would appoint a new prime minister in the next few days, and that he would not resign and would remain in office until the end of his term. Macron accused the French far right and far left of uniting to form an "anti-republican front" whose lawmakers chose chaos "not for construction but for destruction."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Henan bank depositors across the country have started to "beg for food" at their local police stations.
Since depositors cannot go to Beijing and dare not go to Zhengzhou, they cannot withdraw their money, so they can only go to the local police station to "beg for food". For the sake of maintaining stability, the police station is afraid that the desperate depositors will go out and drive their cars to hit people, so they have to provide them with boxed meals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: The Qingyang Urban Management Office stated that all the partition handrails installed on the benches had been removed overnight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
An example of how CCTV spreads rumors:
CCTV News reported that 20,000 bodies were found in a hangar in Colombia, and the Attorney General has gone to investigate. In fact, according to the United Nations investigation report, the 20,000 bodies were found elsewhere and could not be identified, and were temporarily stored in a warehouse by the authorities.
CCTV used a technique similar to UC shocking style, taking advantage of the language barrier that cannot be verified, exaggerating the news title and content, and thus spreading rumors.
Of course, any forced disappearance is unacceptable.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 3, someone posted on BYD’s forum that a girl jumped from the 12th floor of BYD’s dormitory in the Shenshan Park in Shanwei at 10 pm on December 2. The scene was quickly blocked and no further news was heard.
Afterwards, everyone continued to work the night shift as normal. The poster believed that the girl had jumped off the building to escape from the sea of suffering.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution On the afternoon of December 2, a fire broke out in the dormitory of Guangdong Hotel Management Vocational and Technical College. Students tried to put out the fire but found that there was no water in the fire hydrant and the smoke alarm did not work. Afterwards, the school did not reflect on the problems with the fire-fighting facilities or hold the relevant responsible persons accountable, but instead pushed the responsibility onto the students.
Now, it is not allowed to use power strips in the dormitory, nor is it allowed to hang bed curtains, and it is not allowed to charge computers in the dormitory.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen submitted a post searching for self-study materials for the course "Xi Jinping's New Thought" on the website and found that searching for "Xi Jinping's New Thought" on Xiaohongshu did not yield any results, but searching for "Winnie the Pooh's New Thought" did yield the correct results.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 4, Yantai Gymnasium issued a notice: According to the instructions from higher authorities, some roads were closed and isolation facilities were installed to prevent motor vehicles and fitness people from crossing each other.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: At noon on December 5, some migrant workers went to the Chengdu campus of Sichuan Construction Vocational and Technical College to ask for their wages and were taken away by a police car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution December 5th Changbaishan High-speed Railway Station A driver knelt down in the snow to law enforcement officials.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 4 Cathay Pacific apologizes for mentioning "Tiananmen" and showing tanks in the in-flight PTV
Cathay Pacific is involved in a national security controversy. Someone posted a post accusing Cathay Pacific of showing a tank driving on the road and a person in front of the tank in one of the American animation "Family Guy" clips provided by the in-flight entertainment system of Cathay Pacific flights for less than 10 seconds. The person questioned Cathay Pacific for "spreading subversive ideas" and reported to the National Security Department of the police
Cathay Pacific said yesterday (4th) that it sincerely apologized to the affected passengers and emphasized that the content of the video does not represent Cathay Pacific's position.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: One netizen reported that his new Great Wall Cannon, which he had just bought for a year, could not pass the exhaust gas test. So he asked whether it was the problem with the car, or with Sinopec, the policy, or himself?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 4, in Guangzhou, Guangdong, a man held a milk tea shop employee hostage with a kitchen knife.
The video shows that the man was emotional and shouted to the police in front of him: "Shoot me to death, I don't want to kill her, she forced me to do it." Then there was suspected gunshot in the video. The person who filmed: "They (the police) set off flash bombs"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 5, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated that China is willing to work with Japan to promote the improvement and development of China-Japan relations, which triggered ridicule from netizens.
Netizens responded, "I don't hate you today, but I'll be ready to hate you anytime I need you to!" 
"You hate whoever I tell you to hate, but now I tell you not to hate, haha"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 4, "positive energy" blogger Xiang Ligang wrote: If Qiong Yao were in mainland China, she would never commit suicide. She might live to be a hundred years old like Ye Jiaying. Taiwan, a moral and IQ low point, is a murderous place.
